name: Slime Slayer 2D
description:
Just you and slimes, many slime, come from both side of the world. Slay 'em all, for your life, your world till the new year.

The game was made for The Mini Jam #44, so it just has 3 inputs for you to save the world: LEFT/RIGHT arrow to move, SPACE to slash.

Resources uses (thank you all):

Player:  https://rvros.itch.io/animated-pixel-hero
Slime: https://rvros.itch.io/pixel-art-animated-slime

World: https://trixelized.itch.io/nightfield

Font: https://managore.itch.io/m5x7
